\Aura\Cli

\Aura\CliException

Classes

GetoptInitialized Getopt has already been initialized.
OptionArray The option definition needs to be an array.
OptionName Option objects need to be initialized with a name.
OptionNotDefined Asked for an option that is not defined.
OptionNotMulti The option does not allow multiple values.
OptionParam The option 'param' value needs a proper constant.
OptionParamRejected The option requires that no parameter be present.
OptionParamRequired The option requires a non-blank parameter.
